description: Detect tables that appear to be used for layout instead of data.
recommendation: Replace layout tables with semantic layout containers (div, flex, grid). (WCAG 2.1 SC 1.3.1,1.3.2)
algorithm: Flags tables without headers/captions and without role=presentation/none as likely layout tables.
algorithm_advanced: Flags tables lacking role=presentation/none and missing <th> or <caption> markers.
